General.Name: Caixa Seguridade Participações S.A
General.Description: Caixa Seguridade Participações S.A. provides various life and non-life insurance products in Brazil. It offers residential, lender, and auto insurance products; and pension products, capitalization bonds, and consortium products, as well as health and dental plans. The company was incorporated in 2015 and is based in Brasília, Brazil. Caixa Seguridade Participações S.A. is a subsidiary of Caixa Econômica Federal.
General.Address: CAIXA Matriz III Building, Brasília, DF, Brazil, 70070-030
